holidays.title: Cyber Monday
holidays.description: Shop those amazing Black Friday deals from the comfort of your couch or office.

holidays.title: Chatham Islands Anniversary Day
holidays.description: Fellow island lovers, brace yourself as we gain more knowledge on your favorite topic.

holidays.title: Mauritania Independence Day
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate Mauritania Independence Day and learn more about this fascinating country!

holidays.title: National Alan Day
holidays.description: Let’s stand up and celebrate all the Alans in our lives to make them feel special today!

holidays.title: National Brand Day
holidays.description: If you’re an entrepreneur, this is the day to celebrate your brand.

holidays.title: National Cole Day
holidays.description: Show your solidarity to a name that is widely popularized throughout the world, National Cole Day!

holidays.title: National Madison Day
holidays.description: Gender is not an obstacle when you plan to name your child Madison!

holidays.title: National Patrick Day
holidays.description: Roll out the drums, wrap up the gifts, and let’s celebrate with the Patricks!

holidays.title: National Sovereignty Day Argentina
holidays.description: Some battles are won with defeat — or so Sovereignty Day tells us.

holidays.title: Red Planet Day
holidays.description: We recognize the planet which has captivated human observers for countless years, Mars.

holidays.title: Anna Nicole Smith’s Birthday
holidays.description: This star was famous for her charisma, charm, and talent before her untimely death.

holidays.title: Arjun Gupta’s Birthday
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate this star who has received several awards and nominations.

holidays.title: Bryshere Gray’s Birthday
holidays.description: Gray has played at several Philadelphia music events, including Jay-Z's “Made in America” Festival.

holidays.title: Charisse Galang’s Birthday
holidays.description: This social media content creator is among the most successful American YouTube stars.

holidays.title: Chase Elliott’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this road-racing, series-winning NASCAR driving champion, the race track to success calls!

holidays.description: Knowledge lives forever, and this professor has endlessly contributed to its endurance.

holidays.title: Fatman Scoop’s Birthday
holidays.description: He has interviewed a wide range of personalities in the entertainment world for his podcast.

holidays.title: Jake Miller’s Birthday
holidays.description: Jake Miller, while still in high school, began uploading his music videos on YouTube.

holidays.title: Jarvis Landry’s Birthday
holidays.description: This New Orleans Saints football player is one of the N.F.L.’s most talented.

holidays.title: Jon Stewart’s Birthday
holidays.description: This brilliant television show host has won over 20 Primetime Emmy Awards in his career.

holidays.title: Judd Nelson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Judd Nelson was a teen star in the 1980s and we are excited to celebrate him today!

holidays.title: Karen Gillan’s Birthday

holidays.title: Kinigra Deon’s Birthday

holidays.description: Vega is well-known for numerous reasons, including being a single mother to her son Prince.
